name: Cataract,PosteriorPolar
title: Cataract, Posterior Polar
description: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent a diagnosis of posterior polar cataract.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Diagnosis.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with a diagnosis of posterior polar cataract, including capsular or subcapsular cataract.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes concepts that pertain to 'unspecified eye.')
